${ModID}:RuleCancel.NAME: Rule Cancel
${ModID}:RuleCancel.DESCRIPTION: Make a card in your hand ${ModID}:Occult. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:RuleCancel.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Make a card in your hand ${ModID}:Occult.

${ModID}:Brainwave.NAME: Brainwave
${ModID}:Brainwave.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Make a random Attack in your hand ${ModID}:Occult.

${ModID}:TelephonePole.NAME: Telephone Pole
${ModID}:TelephonePole.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Locking. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Locked. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable.

${ModID}:Gravity.NAME: Gravity
${ModID}:Gravity.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Whenever you draw a ${ModID}:Locked or Unplayable card, draw a card.
${ModID}:Gravity.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a ${ModID}:Locked or Unplayable card, draw a card.

${ModID}:PhantomStep.NAME: Phantom Step
${ModID}:PhantomStep.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Make a card in your draw pile ${ModID}:Occult.

${ModID}:Repel.NAME: Repel
${ModID}:Repel.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Locking. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Locked. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak.

${ModID}:OneIsEnough.NAME: One Is Enough
${ModID}:OneIsEnough.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Draw !M! card{!M!|0=s.|1=.|2=s and choose one. NL You cannot play the other this turn.|@=s and choose one. NL You cannot play the others this turn.}

${ModID}:Curse.NAME: Curse
${ModID}:Curse.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Locking. NL Retain. NL Enemy loses !M! Strength.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Locked. NL Retain. NL Enemy loses !M! Strength.

${ModID}:MalleableFire.NAME: Malleable Fire
${ModID}:MalleableFire.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X times. NL Add a *Molded *Fire that costs X to your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:MalleableFire.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X times. NL Add a *Molded *Fire+ that costs X to your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:MoldedFire.NAME: Molded Fire
${ModID}:MoldedFire.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Occult. NL Deal !D! damage for each [E] more this costs than your current energy.

${ModID}:DeepDream.NAME: Deep Dream
${ModID}:DeepDream.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card this turn, make a random card in your hand ${ModID}:Occult. NL Exhaust.
